attributes.action: honour Barry Sindall the retiring Headteacher of Colyton Grammar School, Devon, one of Britain's most successful state schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Barry Sindall has transformed Colyton Grammar School from the ordinary to the extraordinary. 
Amongst his many visionary and creative innovations, he has introduced "Critical Thinking" for all year groups. 
Would that all students throughout the country could experience the quality of education on offer in this school under the inspired Headship of Barry Sindall.
